level.heading: FILING REQUIREMENTS[COLON] TRANSFER OF OWNERSHIP AND ANNUAL REPORT (ยง 15-603)

level.text: A PSP may request that its certificate be canceled.
A request for cancellation of the certificate shall be in writing and shall include:
A list of the locations of each PSP payphone(s), if any;

The PSP’s specific plans for terminating service and removing the pay telephone(s), or its plans for transferring the PSP’s registered pay telephones to another certified PSP in accordance with ยง 610; and
The date on which the PSP wishes the cancellation to become effective.

If a request for cancellation of a certificate meets the requirements under this section, the Commission shall within ten (10) days send written notice to the PSP that its certificate has been canceled.
